cards.summary: See care team and discuss treatment for hypertension if event recurs.
cards.detail: {{#patient}}You recently had a condition recorded that may be an adverse event from high blood pressure treatment; you noted to us that this was already treated, but if it recurs or doesn't get better, please contact your care team.{{/patient}}{{#careTeam}}Patient has experienced an adverse event, which has been treated.
